name: MA_PREMIUM_LIS
description: Stores Medicare Advantage (MA) Low Income Subsidies (LIS) and their effective periods.

columns.name: COVERAGE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim value record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: EFF_DATE
columns.description: The effective date for a Low Income Subsidy (LIS) period.

columns.name: TERM_DATE
columns.description: The term date for a Low Income Subsidy (LIS) period.

columns.name: LIS_PERCENTAGE
columns.description: The Part D Low Income Premium Subsidy (LIPS) for an LIS period.

columns.name: LIS_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description: This item stores the Low Income Source Code (Applicant or Deemed).
